For the implementation of the service layer, we use the JAX-RS for both Quarkus and Spring applications to create the REST services. Classic devon4j Spring applications rely on Apache CFX as the implemention of JAX-RS.
For Quarkus, we use RESTEasy. Since both are implementations of JAX-RS, much of the Spring application code can be reused.
